alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 01 at 8:55PM CDT until April 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Danger Far Southwest Kansas Monday Afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074, 084, AND 085... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074, 084, AND 085... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 8 percent. * IMPACTS...Any ignition will have the potential to exhibit extreme fire behavior, and burn out of control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
